Why is it that you say a properly made kabuto would
not pas inspection? I can not think of any sca wide
convention that cant be met by a propery made kabuto.
--kiyohara
--- Michael Peters <shdwstel@...> wrote:
> 
> Shawn,
> 
>   Can you be a bit more specific? What is the
> purpose of said kabuto? Is 
> this for a living history group? A desk sculpture?

> for the SCA).
> 
>
